name: GalactiGolf
description:
Online multiplayer gravity-based golf!

Made in one week for the S&T Fall 2022 Game Jam. This was my first time experimenting with Networking in Godot (or at all), and while it's quite rough around the edges I think I learned a lot.

Note to those from the future: if the online play button doesn't work, my AWS free subscription probably expired. Sorry.
